Installation¶

Stable release¶

To install PyVista Tools, run this command in your terminal:

$ pip install git+https://github.com/acreegan/pyvista_tools.git

This is the preferred method to install PyVista Tools, as it will always install the most recent stable release.

If you don’t have pip installed, this Python installation guide can guide you through the process.

From sources¶

The sources for PyVista Tools can be downloaded from the Github repo.

You can either clone the public repository:

$ git clone git://github.com/acreegan/pyvista_tools.git

Or download the tarball:

$ curl -OJL https://github.com/acreegan/pyvista_tools/tarball/master

Once you have a copy of the source, you can install it with:

$ python setup.py install
